snake.gui
Class SEngine

java.lang.Object
  snake.gui.SEngine

public class SEngine
extends java.lang.Object

Snake Engine This class is the "helper engine" of the game. Its public constants and methods can be used by the "main engine".

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $, $Date: 2003/10/13 18:05:13 $
Author:
Roger H. Joerg et altera

Constructor Detail

SEngine

public SEngine()
Default constructor. Initializes the Snake Game Engine.

Method Detail

setMenuHandler

public void setMenuHandler(SEngineMenuHandler menuHandler)
Sets the menu handler Create a class which implements the interface SEngineMenuHandler. Create an instance of it and call this method with that instance as a parameter. Your class will be called to handle the menu selections.

Parameters:
menuHandler - the menu handler to set

setKeyHandler

public void setKeyHandler(SEngineKeyHandler keyHandler)
Sets the "keyboard" handler. Create a class which implements the interface SEngineKeyHandler. Create an instance of it and call this method with that instance as a parameter. Your instance will be called if the user presses the ',' (comma) or left arrow key (to turn the snake to the left) or if the user presses the '.' (dot) or right arrow key (to turn the snake to the right).

Parameters:
keyHandler - the key handler to set

setTimerHandler

public void setTimerHandler(SEngineTimerHandler timerHandler)
Sets the "timer" handler. Create a class which implements the interface SEngineTimerHandler. Create an instance of it and call this method with that instance as a parameter. Your instance will be called periodically to handle your event if the timer has elapsed its period.

Parameters:
timerHandler - the timer handler to set

setTimer

public void setTimer(int delay)
Sets the delay between timer events.

Parameters:
delay - Delay between timer events in milliseconds. Use zero or a negative value to stop the timer.

setScenePainter

public void setScenePainter(SEngineScenePainter painter)
Sets the "scene" painter. Create a class which implements the interface SEngineScenePainter. Create an instance of it and call this method with that instance as a parameter. Your class will be called to paint the contents of the "scene".

Parameters:
painter - the painter to set

setStatusPainter

public void setStatusPainter(SEngineStatusPainter painter)
Sets the "status" painter. Create a class which implements the interface SEngineStatusPainter. Create an instance of it and call this method with that instance as a parameter. Your class will be called to paint the contents of the "scene".

Parameters:
painter - the painter to set

show

public void show()
Shows the main window of the Snake Game Engine centered on the screen.

invalidate

public void invalidate()
Invalidates the window, such that it will repaint all contents.
